thread.title: Sydney mum's baby shoes score place in Oscar's gift bags
thread.title_full: Sydney mum's baby shoes score place in Oscar's gift bags

title: Sydney mum's baby shoes score place in Oscar's gift bags
text: Share 65 shares 'I was looking for a pre-walker for my then 14 m/o son that wouldn't fall off,' she explained in a 2014 interview with AusMumpreneur . 'I brought these unique shoes back to Australia and within days realised their potential. 'I quickly secured the exclusive distributorship and have since grown a cult following.' Ready to go! The shoes will be presented in handmade gift bags (pictured) which feature the Attipas logo The shoes will be displayed in the gifting suite, where 9Honey reports Academy Awards nominees will be invited to come and fill a bag with their chosen goodies. Everything in the suite is free, and previous gifts for nominees have included luxurious clothing, skin care and even overseas holidays. Last year's gift bag was worth a whopping $232,000USD and included pet food and a vampire breast lift. 'Each celebrity will be gifted a selection of Attipas shoes of their choosing,' she told 9Honey. Is it a shoe or a sock? The Attipas shoe is designed as a hybrid of a shoe and a sock, and Ms Africh says it won't fall off Baby ambassador! The Sydney mother-of-two hopes Reign Disick will be an early US adopter of the shoes 'I have seen the gifting suite lists in previous years, and I feel so privileged to be joining them.' The mother-of-two is hoping her new and very exclusive market will open up new doors for her business. And though she'd be happy to see any celebrity baby in the shoes, she does have her eye on one little boy in particular. 'We're certain that Reign Disick would look amazing in them.' Read more:
